text: The fourth season of Caribbean's Next Top Model, a Caribbean reality television show, premiered on 14 February 2018. It features a number of aspiring models from the entire Caribbean region, who compete for a chance to begin their career in the modelling industry. The fourth season of the show has 16 contestants and was taped in Jamaica.
